name: Shipping & Delivery Date management with gift message
author: CedCommerce

sections.description:
Shipping & Delivery Date management with gift message extension allows selection of delivery date, messaging of gift hampers, shipping address management feature. All these features are available on product page. By using this extension the admin can gives various functionalities to the customers like:

For additional features of Shipping & Delivery Date management with gift message, upgrade to the premium version of Shipping & Delivery Date management with gift message.

  • Gift message for every product can be set by customer.
  • On the basis of customer’s choice, his delivery date would be selected.
  • Shipping address for every product on product page can be set by customer.

Customer can set

  • Recipient address- To whom he wants to send the product.
  • Delivery Date- The date he wants to receive the product.
  • Delivery Time- The time range between which he wants to receive the product.
  • Gift Message- Text message can be set that he/she wants to send with the product on every product page. This feature is for both logged in and non-logged in customers.

The Admin can also customize this extension like he can enable or disable the extension, can customize Delivery date like week off, nearest order delivery date, disable Past day, can add extra cost based on days, can disable multiple dates, can choose multiple days he is not able to supply orders and can also disable /enable specific feature of this extension.

Main Features of Free Version

  • Prevent delivery on selected days.
  • Option to deliver on all week days.
  • Add extra cost based on days.
  • Enable / Disable delivery date feature on frontend.
  • Enable / Disable gift message feature on frontend.
  • Enable / Disable shipping address feature on frontend.
  • Gift message for every product can be set by customer.
  • On the basis of customer’s choice, his delivery date would be selected.
  • Shipping address for every product on product page can be set by customer.
  • Order email send with product additional information
  • Show-hide delivery address at cart/checkout/order pages to win space.
  • Adjust the spacing/padding around the position of the gift box.
  • Option for displaying shipping and delivery form on selected product categories.

Shipping & Delivery Date management with gift message (PRO)

The Shipping & Delivery Date management with gift message extension allows your customer to select delivery date, to provide message of gift hampers and enter shipping address.

Main Features of Premium Version

âœ… Enable / Disable feature for non-logged in user.
âœ… Enable / Disable delivery on weekends.
âœ… Enable minimum delivery days.
âœ… Enable / Disable delivery on future dates
âœ… Works for both Guests and Members.
âœ… Easy and simple configuration.
âœ… Easy to use and install
âœ… Easy to configure
âœ… Easy Customization
âœ… Translation Ready.
âœ… Simple and Easy to use.

**You can get premium version from [here](http://cedcommerce.com/woocommerce-extensions/shipping-delivery-date-management-with-gift-message)**

ðŸ”¸ One Click Order Re-Order: It is used to add any previous order products to cart.After installing this plugin a button having name Re-Order will be added at Order listing section on My Account page next to each orders as well as on order detail page.
ðŸ”¸ Recently viewed and most viewed products: Recently viewed and most viewed products provides an extra feature to merchant to show recently viewed products and most viewed products on the product detail page and also at any place through out the site by adding given shortcode.
ðŸ”¸ WP Advanced PDF: WP Advanced PDF is a pdf generator for posts to pages. This plugin enables your blog readers to create pdf of posts of your blog. WP Advanced PDF relies on the TCPDF class to render PDF.

sections.installation:
Automatic installation

In the search field type ” Shipping & Delivery Date management with gift message” and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found our ‘Shipping & Delivery Date management with gift message’ you can view details about it such as the point release, rating and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading the plugin and uploading it to your webserver via your favourite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.

Updating

No Automatic updates should work in free version ,you can get automatic update in premium version .
sections.faq:
What is Shipping & Delivery Date management with gift message ?

Shipping & Delivery Date management with gift message extension allows selection of delivery date, messaging of gift hampers, shipping address management feature.
sections.changelog:
2.0.0

  • Bug Fixes, improves stability with WooCommerce 6.6.1.
  • Added instant support feature.
  • Design enhancement.

1.0.14

  • Bug Fixes, improves stability with WooCommerce 6.4.1
  • Design enhancement.

1.0.13

  • Bug Fixes, improves stability with WooCommerce 4.0.1

1.0.12

  • Bug Fixing, and delivery date issue

1.0.11

  • Bug fixed.

1.0.10

  • Bug fixed.

1.0.9

  • Compatible with WooCommerce 3.1.1.

1.0.9

  • Compatible with WooCommerce 3.0.

1.0.8

  • Added a few strings to language file.

1.0.7

  • Fix Bugs on saving setings

1.0.6

  • Provided functionality to set delivery time range for receiving product.
  • Provided option for supplying all week days.
  • Provided option for displaying shipping and delivery form on selected product categories.
  • Provided option for setting limited gift message length.

1.0.5

  • Fixed the issue of padding

1.0.4

  • Provided functionality to save decimal cost also

1.0.3

  • Provided settings for adjusting spacing/padding around the position of the gift box

1.0.2

  • Provided multiple date format option.

1.0.1

  • Solve Notice and optimize plugin.

1.0.0

  • It is the initial version of this plugin. No Changelog available.

short_description: This will add additional feature to allow your customer to put delivery date and address with some gift message of their own choice per product.
